title: How To Protect Yourself And Others
content:
Core Prevention Strategies
CDC recommends
that all people use core prevention strategies to protect themselves and others from COVID-19:
Stay up to date with
COVID-19 vaccines
.
Although vaccinated people sometimes get infected with the virus that causes COVID-19, staying up to date on COVID-19 vaccines significantly lowers the risk of getting very sick, being hospitalized, or dying from COVID-19.
Practice good
hygiene
(practices that improve cleanliness)
Take
steps for cleaner air
